data.message: #eminemweek _ #eminem RapGod forever everyday everymoment everytime every nights and days forever immortal in my heart through my blood my hopes and I'll keep dreaming alive no matter what if if I die I can't live without him in my life yo Don't forget it's #EminemWeek over at Complex Magazine! Check the cover story and follow this link to catch new content every day: http://shady.sr/EmWeek
